articles.title: Tech News of the week: Bard is now Gemini, OpenAI’s CEO seeks trillion dollars in funding and more - The Indian Express
articles.description: Tech News of the week (Second week of February 2024): Google has officially renamed its AI chatbot from Bard to Gemini and OpenAI's CEO Sam Altman is seeking $7 trillion in funding.
articles.content: Gemini is the new name of Google's generative AI-powered chatbot, which is now available via the web, Android, and also for iOS users. There is a free tier Gemini and users can also get access to the… [+178 chars]

articles.title: Miffed Musk relocates Neuralink from Delaware after Tesla pay package ruling - UPI News
articles.description: Neuralink Corp. founder and investor Elon Musk is relocating the tech company from Delaware to Nevada after losing a $55.8 billion Tesla pay package that a Delaware judge recently nixed.
articles.content: Feb. 10 (UPI) -- Neuralink Corp. founder and investor Elon Musk is relocating the tech company from Delaware to Nevada after losing a $55.8 billion Tesla pay package that a Delaware judge recently ni… [+2239 chars]
